rules_text:
Lifelink, deathtouch
[i]Daughter of Hel[/i] – If a creature would die, exile it instead.
[i]Death's Blade[/i] – Whenever Eir, Princess of Life deals combat damage, put a creature card in exile on the bottom of its owner's library.
[i]Princess[/i] of [i]Life[/i] – When Eir dies, return each creature in exile to the battlefield under its owner's control.
